title: Mexican Light: Exciting, Healthy Recipes from the Border and Beyond
description: As she did in her bestselling, highly acclaimed Mediterranean Light, Shulman creates marvelous healthful adaptations of classic dishes - this time re-creating Mexican cuisine, her first love as a cook. The result is a cookbook to treasure. Mexican Light lets you eat all the irresistible foods from south of the border - for parties, for company, and for every day.Largely vegetarian but with an abundance of chicken and fish dishes, the recipes in Mexican Light are a great way to keep within dietary guidelines without sacrificing an ounce of pleasure.
author: Martha Rose Shulman
